VI.iii.4.2.g
.
Example 1:  Determining Payment Rates
Situation
:  The Veteran was receiving compensation in the amount of $774, including an additional amount for a spouse, for a static disability evaluated as 70-percent disabling, subject to an insurance deduction in the amount of $15.  The DIC rate available to the spouse is $564, based on the pay grade E-1 from 04/01/1990.
Result
:  Since the DIC rate is less than the rate of compensation payable to the Veteran, the full DIC rate is payable to the spouse.
